ValidationRule.description: Requests a reason if a story has been marked as out of scope, duplicate, or cancelled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( PF_Story_Status__c , 'Out of Scope') ,ISPICKVAL( PF_Story_Status__c , 'Duplicate'),ISPICKVAL( PF_Story_Status__c , 'Cancelled')) , ISBLANK( PF_Story_Status_Reason__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Provide a brief reason why the story has been marked out of scope, duplicate, or cancelled.
